alert.note: Alert for Fentress; Overton; Pickett (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 2:26AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Overton, Pickett and Fentress Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 226 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Byrdstown, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jamestown, Byrdstown, Allardt, Wolf River Dock, Pall Mall, Static and Huntersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Brief heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized minor flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
